entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Reading JsonNode Property Throws 'Nullable object must have a value' on first access #106298
  • [NativeAOT] string[] not assignable to IList<object> #106297
  • Build failure: ilc exited with code 139 #106293
  • [API Proposal]: Adding logging http fails to LoggingHttpMessageHandler #106284
  • ILVerify complains about conversion from `string[]` to `IList<object>` #106282
  • Incorrect result computed for tensor slices #106280
    9.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Enable `ConditionalSelect_FalseOp` scenario in first-faulting test templates #106279
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed '(tree->gtDebugFlags & GTF_DEBUG_NODE_MORPHED) && "ERROR: Did not morph this node!"' during 'Morph - Global' #106278
    9.0.0
  • Mono llvm crash when emitting shuffle intrinsic #106270
    10.0.0
  • [Test Failure] EventSource_SendingRequest_PathAndQueryRedaction_LogsStartStop #106268
  • ignore posix signal and shutdown nethost gracefully #106262
    10.0.0
  • [MonoAOT] [x64] Return non-void in Function of void return type #106259
  • [iOS/tvOS][fullAOT-llvm] Failures inside System.Runtime BigInteger tests #106256
  • JIT: Invariant array element access not hoisted out of loop #106255
    10.0.0
  • OpenSSL 3.x deprecated RC2 ciphers #106248
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add `GetLittleEndianBytes/GetBigEndianBytes` overloads in `BinaryPrimitives` #106247
  • Test failure: JIT/Intrinsics/MathFusedMultiplyAdd_ro/MathFusedMultiplyAdd_ro.cmd #106244
  • Test failure: profiler/transitions/transitions/transitions.sh #106243
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: GC/API/GC/GetTotalAllocatedBytes/GetTotalAllocatedBytes.sh #106242
  • Test failure: profiler\\assembly\\ALCTest\\ALCTest.cmd #106241
    10.0.0
  • BinaryFormatter removal from .NET 9 is complete #106240
    9.0.0

Closed

  • [9.0.100-preview.7.24375.12] Markdig nuget package thrown "The parser is in an invalid infinite loop while trying to parse inlines for block..." exception when parsering markdown string to html #105792
    9.0.0
  • Trim analyzer: Implement type name parsing #95118
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed '(m_result->gtDebugFlags & GTF_DEBUG_NODE_MORPHED) == (node->gtDebugFlags & GTF_DEBUG_NODE_MORPHED)' during 'Morph - Global' #106141
    9.0.0
  • [browser] Unsupported long branch opcode #106028
    9.0.0
  • Convert.FromHexString returning an OperationStatus throws unless destination buffer is precisely sized #105405
    9.0.0
  • Required memory PHIs are not added for un-analyzable memory stores by SSA #86112
    9.0.0
  • Assertion in BigIntegerCalculator #103247
    9.0.0
  • After creating a Worker service project, "System.text.json" 8.0.0 was referenced and identified as a vulnerable package #105120
    9.0.0
  • FileVersionInfo.ProductMajorPart, FileVersionInfo.ProductMinorPart, FileVersionInfo.ProductBuildPart are not set in NET8 #95919
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 5 Regressions in BigInteger.Multiply #102319
    9.0.0
  • System.IO.Ports.SerialPort not working on linux-musl-arm #104710
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 2 Regressions on 2/20/2024 7:35:45 PM #99003
    9.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Buffers.Tests.ReadOnlySequenceTests #98507
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 2 Regressions on 2/7/2024 9:09:09 PM #98371
    9.0.0
  • [mono] Regression of BigInteger.Multiply on arm64 AOT-llvm #95403
    9.0.0
  • Kerberos/Negotiate does not work with SmtpClient #105938
  • `gtTreeHasSideEffects` handles `GT_INTRINSIC` incorrectly #106187
    9.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Memory.Span<Char> #91619
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 1 Regression on 8/20/2023 5:37:20 PM #91281
    9.0.0
  • [mono] Failed to load AOT module "Methodical_*" #105395
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: Regressions in System.Collections on 8/2/2024 1:16:56 PM #106027
    9.0.0
  • Consider replacing IntrinsicAttribute with SpecialNameAttribute #46424
    Future
  • ignore posix signal and shutdown nethost gracefully #106263
  • Test failure: tracing/eventpipe/eventsourceerror/eventsourceerror/eventsourceerror.cmd #106113
    9.0.0
  • HttpClient.Timeout seems to be canceling before expected #103134
  • In .NET 7 large number of concurrent requests will memory leak #81056
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: IsWeekend() method for struct DateTime instance #106246
  • WasmTestOnChrome-MT-System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests timeout #106094
    10.0.0
  • System.Text.Json should allow any JSON type to be able to deserialzie to `string` type. #106245
  • InlineArray in generic class #106129
    9.0.0
  • System.Text.Json source generator doesn't handle `ReadOnlySpan<T>` properties correctly #98590
    9.0.0
  • NTLM does not always work properly on all platforms with MAUI with SocketsHttpHandler #102483
    Future
  • [apple] Failure in System.Net.Sockets.Tests: "Too many open files in system" #105688
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [manual] Merge release/8.0-staging into release/8.0 #106301
    area-codeflow
  • [manual] Merge release/6.0-staging into release/6.0 #106300
    area-codeflow
  • Make acquiring the loader module for a FnPtrTypeDesc a simple operation instead of a complex algorithm #106299
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix x86 VectorT_ToScalar(long) when SSE41 not available #106296
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix: SettingsProperty constructor ignores serializeAs parameter if it is not SettingsSerializeAs.Binary #106295
    area-System.Configuration
  • Workaround EventSource counters race condition in networking tests #106294
    area-System.Net.Http
  • ARM64-SVE: Emit `AddSequentialAcross` correctly #106292
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add missing xml docs for System.Numerics #106290
    area-System.Numerics
  • Reenable more_tailcalls under GCStress #106287
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Avoid clearing morphed flag in `gtSetEvalOrder` #106286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix passing targetRID into sourcebuild job #106285
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix logging formatting #106283
    area-Extensions-Logging, 9.0.0
  • Add area ownership for System.ClientModel #106281
    area-Meta
  • [test] Add heuristic params for full collection in GC regression test #106276
    test-failure, disabled-test, area-Codegen-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • Provide Microsoft.Bcl.Memory package readme #106273
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [HttpClientFactory] Don't log header values by default #106271
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [HttpClientFactory] Revert workaround for empty name HttpClient fallback #106269
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] Pass structs containing empty struct arrays according to integer calling convention #106266
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [LoongArch64] Add memory barriers to native AOT asm helpers. #106252
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • Bump requirement for QUIC async cert validation to MsQuic 2.4 #106251
    area-System.Net.Quic

Merged

  • JIT: limit phi-refinement to loop-invariant VNs #106229
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Implement type name resolution for ILLink analyzer #106209
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/8.0-staging] Workaround bug in EvtFormatMessage #105762
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog, 8.0.9
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #106044
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #106045
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [cdac] Change Module data descriptor for lookup maps #106291
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Don't vectorize division for integer types #106288
    area-System.Numerics
  • [release/8.0-staging] For transition profiler callbacks, always load the thread #105200
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.9
  • Fix loading of cDAC in DAC #106289
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Mention ILVerification breaking change in ILVerification package release notes #106193
    area-ILVerification
  • [RISC-V] Add GetRegOffsInCONTEXT() implementation (fix for `clrstack -p` SOS command). #106277
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [LoongArch64] Enable TLS on linux/loongarch64 only for static resolver. #106250
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 9.0.0
  • Add `DebuggerHidden` to managed JitHelpers #106167
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Convert.FromHexString exception with too large buffer #105426
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • RunWithFakeThreshold with DisableParallelization #103423
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • JIT: Handle memory conservatively in handler blocks in VN #106274
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Skip putting patches in certain stubs to prevent crashing on step-in on M1 with JMC disabled #106105
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Clean up ILLink logic for "inflating" generic types #106211
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Avoid package dependencies on libraries in the shared framework #106172
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add unmanaged assembly skipping to ILStrip task #106267
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios
  • Update dispose async test timeout and better diagnostics #106272
    test-bug, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 9.0.0
  • Fix native libs selection in System.IO.Ports package #106231
    area-System.IO
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `GatherVectorWithByteOffsetFirstFaulting` #106199
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve, 9.0.0
  • fix redundant CRLF response during SMTP negotiate #105939
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove special handling for `GT_INTRINSIC` in `gtTreeHasSideEffects` #106257
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Add a release config to enable/disable IV opts #106253
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Provide System.Formats.Asn1 package readme #105882
    area-System.Formats.Asn1, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Fix some issues related to the clrstack command in dotnet-sos for LA64 #106249
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64] delete the LA64's todo within `INLINE_GET_TLS_VAR`. #106254
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • [EventPipe] Block eventpipe delete provider for pending callbacks #106156
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [mono] Test llvm bump #105867
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [RISC-V] JitDisasmWithGC: Output any delta in GC info #106196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Fix `gtNodeHasSideEffects` checking call arguments #106185
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [System.Text.Json] Improve error handling of ref structs, including collection types with ref struct elements. #106083
    area-System.Text.Json, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • [mono] make sure that MonoBundledResource.id is valid #106205
    area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2514032 #105829
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Implementation of SOSDacApi GetMethodDescName for cDAC #106169
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Make all of the trimmer aware of recursive interfaces #103317
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Disable W^X in Rosetta emulated x64 containers on macOS #105117
    Servicing-approved, area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.9
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure we consistently broadcast the result of simd dot product #106031
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Console.Unix: revert SetWindowSize implementation. #100272
    area-System.Console, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Check HFA alignment for valuetype fields #106099
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Ensure XML doc comments exist for the nested classes and IsSupported properties for intrinsics #106091
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Instrumentation #100294
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • [cdac] Synthesize a valid ECMA-335 image for read/write metadata instead of providing a separate metadata reader #106164
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Inject IJW Copy Constructor calls in the JIT instead of in the IL stubs #106000
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • fix #105969 #106218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Enhance the bound generator concept to remove duplicate parameters and make it more pervasive throughout the system #105597
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 10.0.0
  • Ensure that aggregation is consistent regardless of data alignment #106166
    area-System.Numerics
  • Upgrade zlib-ng to 2.2.1 #105771
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Creating new TypeName without reparsing + usage in NRBF #103713
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, binaryformatter-migration
  • Fix 2 issues when triggering a garbage collection via EventPipe #102612
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • fix dn_vector_custom_resize #102591
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Fix stack trace iteration over exceptions #105877
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimize BigInteger.Divide #96895
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Use .alt_entry/.private_extern on Apple platforms #106224
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: add test coverage for *Faulting* cases to make sure inactive lanes are zeroed out (#105580) #106139
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Enable inversion of top-tested loops #105161
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Don't do aggressive block compaction too early #105041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Remove managed interfaces impls defined in CoreCLR #105965
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Add stress mode for skipping lowering conditional nodes to use CPU flags #103358
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Allow moving handler regions in fgRelocateEHRegions #101613
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Remove fallthrough restrictions in `Compiler::fgOptimizeBranch` #105625
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Don't run `fgUpdateFlowGraph` after reordering blocks if using RPO-based layout #105652
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Added all missing xml docs for Tensors #106084
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • ARM64-SVE: Add checks for MOVPRFX sequencing (#105514) #106184
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve, 9.0.0
  • Move GetMethodTable to JIT #105098
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Ensure MOVPRFX is next to SVE instruction in imm tables #106125
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve, 9.0.0
  • Return type from exact method context for call returns #100041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 10.0.0
  • fix warnings in coreclr/jit/compiler.cpp for non-Windows targets #104805
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Implement ARM32 atomic intrinsics #97792
    arch-arm32, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Optimize 'x & cns == cns' pattern #103868
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Extend escape analysis to account for arrays with non-gcref elements #104906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Optimize casts from constant byrefs #99130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Redesign the frame layout to avoid the redundant computation of the stackOffsets #99278
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • missing opportunities in constant folding around bitwise ops #99136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Add support for Add Sve.GatherVectorUInt*ZeroExtendFirstFaulting() #105030
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve, 9.0.0
  • [ILASM] Added `/DET` flag for deterministic compilations #85344
    area-ILTools-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Fix conditional select for Zeroing predicates #102904 #105737
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Fix LA64 and RISCV64 build errors on Windows #100099
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Add `JsonElement.GetPropertyCount()` #106222
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Implement BinaryReader.ReadExactly #106238
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [Mono AOT] [arm64] Fix error when returning zero sized struct #106013
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [RISC-V] Disable robust mutexes in PAL on Qemu #106123
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add GetKeyedService overload with Type #105860
    NO-MERGE, new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Run native aot runtime tests on cet compatible machines #105288
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • DATAS tuning fixes #105545
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Ensure s_defaultTimeoutTicks is set with the same lock. #105542
    area-System.Transactions
  • GC cleanup from #94175 #105517
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr

    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-SunOS, community-contribution
